body:
This is just one of those random topics:
I was wondering, how much time people usually spend on Forums, MC, Avicus etc.

In my case i spend: 1-3 hours on Avicus/Forums, 2-5 hours on regular MC, and then some of the time i spend, going to the mall and such :P. So i would think it would be interesting to find out how much you guys play! :D

FOR MODERATORS:
A bonus question for staff members!:
How many players do you get banned/Kicked/warned etc. During a 24 hours period?..

So again a random topic, and go!!! If you can make it detailed :D

replies.body:
Forums: 2-3 hours
Avicus: 5-6 hours xD
MC: 0.000000000000000001

For the bonus question, it varies a lot. It depends on how much time I spent on the server that day, how many reports I took that day, etc.

To average it out though, I'd say between 30 and 50.

To average it out though, I'd say between 30 and 50.

replies.body:
Forums: 1 hour.
Avicus: 2-3 hours.
MC: 1 hour 

To answer your bonus question, I would say, when I was on vacation, I counted over 80 reports in one day. 
And now... 30-50 reports a day! :D

replies.body:
Forums: 8 hours
Avicus: 6 hours
MC: 8 hours

(Yes, I have a life)
How many players do you get banned/Kicked/warned etc. During a 24 hours period?..
Usually during the weekends, there are a ton of reports to deal with. Approximately, 20+? Even in the 30's.
During the evening here, it's extremely rare to see a report. When we do, every staff member attends it; leaving me obsolete :((

replies.body:
wot? ok,
Forums: Depends from anywhere from 0-3 hours. 
Avicus: if i dont rage quit from it crashing i can get a good 7 hours a day At most  its usually 4-5 though
MC: Minecraft in total is probably 5-8 hours at most, including avicus
yea so thats it, i usually play from the morning to afternoon. After that i get yelled at and have many other things to do. :P

replies.body:
Forums: 1 hour maximum. I hop on If I'm ever bored and have nothing else to do.
Avicus: Beginning to cut down my play time. At most, 1 hour.
MC: Limited to 2 hours max as of now.
